---
title: "Parameters Reference"
---


## Location

All parameters are defined in: **`FacilityEpiSim.rs/parameters.xml`**

## Parameter Table

| Display Name | Variable Name | Type | Default Value |
|--------------|--------------|------|---------------|
| 01. Disease Name | diseaseName | java.lang.String | CRE |
| 02. Transmission rate (beta) per day | beta | double | 0.0615 |
| 03. Mean days to clinical detection | meanDetectionTime | double | 122.0 |
| 04. Mean days to decolonization | avgDecolonizationTime | double | 387.0 |
| 05. Importation Probability | importationRate | double | 0.206 |
| 06. Is active surveillance disease | isActiveSurveillanceAgent | boolean | true |
| 07. Days between tests | daysBetweenTests | double | 14.0 |
| 08. Admission surveillance adherence probability | admissionSurveillanceAdherence | double | 0.911 |
| 09. Midstay Surveillance Adherence | midstaySurveillanceAdherence | double | 0.954 |
| 10. Surveillance test sensitivity | probSurveillanceDetection | double | 0.8 |
| 11. Isolate Patient When Detected | isolatePatientWhenDetected | boolean | true |
| 12. Isolation Effectiveness (0.0 to 1.0) | isolationEffectiveness | double | 0.5 |
| 13. Length of stay mixed gamma probability 1 | prob1 | double | 0.62531 |
| 14. Length of stay mixed gamma shape 1 | shape1 | double | 7.60197 |
| 15. Length of stay Mixed gamma scale 1 | scale1 | double | 3.41952 |
| 16. Length of stay mixed gamma shape 2 | shape2 | double | 1.23279 |
| 17. Length of stay Mixed gamma scale 2 | scale2 | double | 23.52147 |
| 18. Burn In Period (days) | burnInPeriod | int | 3650 |
| 20. Allow Importations During Burn In | allowImportationsDuringBurnIn | boolean | false |
| 21. Start surveillance after burn-in | doActiveSurveillanceAfterBurnIn | boolean | true |
| 22. Generate daily output files (uncheck for batch run) | isBatchRun | boolean | false |
| 23. (Batch Run Only) Extra Iterations at each parameter combination | extraIteration | int | 1 |
| 24. Default Random Seed | randomSeed | int | __NULL__ |
| 25. Total Simulation time (including burn-in) | simulationDurationAfterBurnIn | int | 5475 |
